body.p:
Clark Circuit Court
Commonwealth
vs
Richard Allen
Judgment on Bail bond excuted by Allen as surity for the appearance of Jno D Snowden indicted for suffring Gaming in his house -- Judgment $500,
Snowden has since the Judgment, been arrested & has given his bond with security to appear -- was present at May Term ^1864^ but the Case may continue --
Judgment on bail bond executed by Allen as surity for Andrew J Snowden indicted for Carrying Concealed weapon
Judgment $100. Snowden has since the Judgment, been arrested & gave bond & was present at May Term 1864, but the case was continued --
No Judgment was rendered against either of the principals but against Allen alone.

Clark Cir Ct
Wm Allen
